attributes.action: Remove control of the NHS completely from politicians.They are destroying it.
attributes.background: There will be no NHS soon. Hunt plans alienating junior doctors so in 5-10yrs there will be no seniors, as current juniors have left. The NHS implodes as inhuman workloads remove remaining altruists. The NHS is confirmed dead but it's long enough away (5-10yrs) they deny holding the pillow over it.
